profile_raw:
{
  "company_summary": "Notion ist eine All‑in‑one AI‑gestützte Workspace‑Plattform, die Teams und KI‑Agenten nutzt, um Wissen zu erfassen, Antworten zu finden und Projekte zu automatisieren. Die Plattform kombiniert Docs, Knowledge Base, Projektmanagement, Sites, Mail und Calendar mit eingebauten KI‑Funktionen wie Agents, Enterprise Search und AI Meeting Notes. Notion richtet sich an Teams jeder Größe und bietet Integrationen, Templates, einen Marketplace sowie Enterprise‑Sicherheits- und Verwaltungstools. Unklar: genaue Details zu Funktionsabgrenzungen pro Tarif.",
  "what_they_sell": [
    "Notion Workspace: Docs, Knowledge Base, Project Management, Sites, Templates und Web Clipper",
    "Notion AI: Agents, AI Search, AI Meeting Notes, AI Writing Assistant, AI Research und Übersetzungsfunktionen",
    "Notion Mail und Notion Calendar (AI‑gestützte Inbox und Terminverwaltung)",
    "Integrationen, API und Marketplace zur Verbindung externer Apps und zur Erweiterung der Plattform",
    "Enterprise‑Funktionen: granulare Berechtigungen, Sicherheitstools, SOC 2, ISO 27001 und Datenschutzgarantien"
  ],
  "likely_users": [
    "Cross‑funktionale Teams (z. B. Engineering & Product, Marketing, IT)",
    "Startups und kleine bis mittlere Unternehmen (SMB)",
    "Große Unternehmen / Enterprise‑Organisationen (z. B. Fortune‑100‑Teams)",
    "Bildungsorganisationen und Community‑Nutzer"
  ],
  "possible_ux_opportunities": [
    "Geführte Onboarding‑ und Autorenflüsse für Custom Agents (Konfiguration, Testen, Verhalten anpassen), da \"Custom Agents\" als kommend angekündigt sind",
    "Transparente Anzeige von AI‑Nutzungs‑Limits und Warnungen (zugunsten der erwähnten temporären Reduzierung von AI‑Zugriff bei hohem Gebrauch)",
    "Einfacheres Setup/Debugging für App‑Verbindungen (MCP) mit Schritt‑für‑Schritt Anleitungen und Fehlerdiagnose",
    "Verbesserte Admin‑Dashboards für Enterprise: Rollen, Audit Logs und Nutzungseinblicke direkt sichtbar und konfigurierbar",
    "Personalisierte Marketplace/Template‑Empfehlungen für konkrete AI‑Use‑Cases (z. B. Meeting→Social, Notes→Tasks) zur schnelleren Adoption"
  ],
  "confidence": 85,
  "uncertainties": [
    "Genauer Funktionsumfang und Abgrenzung der unterschiedlichen Preispläne (welche AI‑Features in welchem Plan enthalten sind) — Unklar",
    "Konkreter Zeitpunkt / Release‑Datum für Custom Agents — Unklar",
    "Detaillierter Umfang der Offline‑ oder nativen App‑Funktionen gegenüber Web‑Funktionalität — Unklar",
    "Feinere Details zur Weitergabe von Daten an AI‑Subprozessoren und Aufbewahrung außerhalb der hohen Aussagen (außer den genannten Vertragsgarantien) — Unklar"
  ],
  "sources": [
    {
      "url": "https://www.notion.so",
      "title": "The AI workspace that works for you. | Notion"
    },
    {
      "url": "https://www.notion.so/product/ai",
      "title": "Meet the new Notion AI | Notion"
    }
  ]
}

pages.title: The AI workspace that works for you. | Notion
pages.text: The AI workspace that works for you. | Notion Notion Features Notion AI Build, write, automate Agents New Handles manual tasks Enterprise Search Find answers instantly AI Meeting Notes Perfectly written by AI Docs Simple & powerful Knowledge Base Centralize your knowledge Projects Manage any project Sites Publish anything, fast Get started Explore AI use cases New See what Notion AI can do Browse marketplace Templates for everything View integrations Connect your apps with Notion Download web clipper Save from the web into Notion Try the Notion desktop app for a faster experience Download app Mail Calendar AI Enterprise Pricing Explore Teams Eng & Product Design Marketing IT Team size Startups SMBs Enterprise Education Learn Help center Notion Academy Customer stories Blog Community Partner programs Build API Templates Security Consultants Request a demo Log in Get Notion free One workspace. Zero busywork. Notion is where your teams and AI agents capture knowledge, find answers, and automate projects. Now a team of 7 feels like 70. Get Notion free Request a demo Play Trusted by top teams Introducing Notion 3.0 Notion Agent New You assign the tasks. Your Notion Agent does the work. → Hand off your busywork What used to take days in minutes. Tell it your goal and watch it work. Collaborates with your team It's like having a built-in power user that works alongside your team. Knows everything you know Searches all your pages, messages, files, and the web to surface exactly what you need. Personalized to you Your Agent learns how you work. You control everything from how it behaves to how it looks. Custom Agents Coming soon Automate repetitive tasks. → Enterprise Search One search for everything. → AI Meeting Notes Perfect notes, every time. → Flexible workflows Manage any project, big or small. → Your AI everything app. More productivity. Fewer tools. Bring all your tools and teams under one roof. Calculate savings below. See pricing plans → AI Search $35/user AI Chatbot $20/user AI Meeting Notes $18/user AI Writing Assistant $20/user AI Email App $30/user AI Research $40/user Calendar Scheduling $15/user Team Wiki $10/user Project Management Tool $24/user Basic CRM $20/user Site Builder $20/user Forms $15/user Team size Monthly savings $0 Annual savings $0 Trusted by teams that ship. There’s power in a single platform where you can do all your work. Notion is that single place. Read the full story → View the video Streamlined workflows to reduce timelines by 3x. → “With Notion, every person at Ramp has an AI agent.” → “Notion understands that you can solve a lot of problems with one tool.” → “Notion has been the most powerful and impactful way to streamline our workflow.” → “Using the most AI‑native tools like Notion is an important competitive advantage for us.” → One hub for work and AI keeps everyone informed and work flowing. → Close dialog Play Uh-oh! It looks like your ad blocker is preventing the video from playing. Please watch it on YouTube Read the full story → Over 100M users worldwide #1 knowledge base 3 years running (G2) #1 AI enterprise search (G2) #1 rated AI writing (G2) 62% of Fortune 100 Over 50% of YC companies 1.4M+ community members Over 100M users worldwide #1 knowledge base 3 years running (G2) #1 AI enterprise search (G2) #1 rated AI writing (G2) 62% of Fortune 100 Over 50% of YC companies 1.4M+ community members Over 100M users worldwide #1 knowledge base 3 years running (G2) #1 AI enterprise search (G2) #1 rated AI writing (G2) 62% of Fortune 100 Over 50% of YC companies 1.4M+ community members Let Notion AI handle the busywork. Pick a use case to see how Notion does the work for you. Explore more → Go from brainstorm to roadmap → Turn meetings into social posts → Organize your workspace → Onboard a new hire → Revise a landing page → Plan an offsite → Track favorite restaurants → Transform notes into tasks → Try for free. Get started on Notion Your AI workspace with built-in agents. Download for Mac Notion Mail The AI inbox that thinks like you. Download Notion Calendar Time, scheduling, tasks—all together. Download Notion is always at home right in your browser . English (US) Cookie settings © 2026 Notion Labs, Inc. pages.title: Meet the new Notion AI | Notion
pages.text: Meet the new Notion AI | Notion Notion Features Notion AI Build, write, automate Agents New Handles manual tasks Enterprise Search Find answers instantly AI Meeting Notes Perfectly written by AI Docs Simple & powerful Knowledge Base Centralize your knowledge Projects Manage any project Sites Publish anything, fast Get started Explore AI use cases New See what Notion AI can do Browse marketplace Templates for everything View integrations Connect your apps with Notion Download web clipper Save from the web into Notion Try the Notion desktop app for a faster experience Download app Mail Calendar AI Enterprise Pricing Explore Teams Eng & Product Design Marketing IT Team size Startups SMBs Enterprise Education Learn Help center Notion Academy Customer stories Blog Community Partner programs Build API Templates Security Consultants Request a demo Log in Get Notion free The AI workspace that works for you. All-in-one AI that takes notes, searches apps, and builds workflows, right where you work. Get Notion free Request a demo Trusted by teams at Play Uh-oh! It looks like your ad blocker is preventing the video from playing. Your AI everything app. Spring 2024 All‑in‑one AI. Get started → Too many AI tools? Calculate potential savings here. AI Search $35/user AI Chatbot $20/user AI Meeting Notes $18/user AI Writing Assistant $20/user AI Email App $30/user AI Research $40/user Calendar Scheduling $15/user Team Wiki $10/user Project Management Tool $24/user Basic CRM $20/user Site Builder $20/user Forms $15/user Team size Monthly savings $0 Annual savings $0 Your Notion Agent can build, edit, and take action. Most AI tools stop at ideas. Notion AI gets work across the finish line. Respects custom permissions Personalized to you Connects to tools via MCP Create Custom Agents to automate specific workflows (coming soon) Sign up to learn more → See what Notion AI can do. Explore all use cases → Go from brainstorm to roadmap Explore → Turn meetings into social posts Explore → Revise a landing page Explore → No more waiting for replies. Just ask Notion AI. Enterprise search finds answers in seconds Learn more → Connect your apps Get answers from Notion docs (and PDFs!) Chat with GPT-4.1, Claude 4 and more Generate detailed docs with research mode There’s power in a single platform where you can do all your work out of. Notion is that single place. Nick Erdenberger, GTM Your doc editor, translator, and note-taker. Give your team perfect memory, with AI Meeting Notes Learn more → Create and edit docs in your own style Translate docs into your preferred language Generate flowcharts and diagrams Autofill databases with summaries and insights It's the slickest, most practical implementation of generative AI for the text I've used to date. Alex Heath, Deputy Editor Handles your data with discretion. Trusted by enterprise. Learn more about Notion AI security practices → No training on your data We have contractual agreements with our AI subprocessors that prohibit the use of customer data to train their models. Secure encryption When you use Notion AI, your data is encrypted in-transit using TLS 1.2 or greater. Advanced permissions Specify who can do and create what, with granular precision. GDPR & CCPA We have mapped our privacy program to the GDPR and other global privacy regulations. SOC 2 (Type 2) Our report certifies that our security policies and controls continuously meet the highest industry standards. ISO 27001 Notion is ISO 27001 certified, showing our commitment to the highest requirements of information security. LLM optimization Notion constantly evaluates models from a range of providers, so you always get the best tool for the job. Security & admin tools Keep your workspace safe with security, compliance, analytics, and auditing tools. Zero data retention No data is stored with LLM providers. 30 day retention for non-Enterprise. Questions & answers How much does Notion AI cost? Notion AI is included in the price of Notion's Business and Enterprise plans. If you aren't on these plans, your workspace will have a limited amount of trial usage of Notion AI functionality. How does Notion AI use my data? We follow our standard data protection practices to keep your data encrypted and private. Notion AI will not use your data to train our models unless you opt in to a request to share your data. Any information used to power Notion AI will be shared with AI subprocessors for the sole purpose of providing you with the Notion AI features. We specifically have contractual agreements in place with our AI subprocessors that prohibit the use of customer data to train their models. Learn more about Notion AI security and privacy practices here. What can Notion AI help me do? Notion AI helps with your work, in the same tool where you work. It can help you to: Search across your workspace and connected apps Automate your meeting notes and transcripts Deep research to create detailed docs and reports Generate and edit content Autofill content across hundreds of database rows at once Translate content into your language Create a database setup from scratch Sort and filter your email inbox (Notion Mail AI) To ensure optimal performance and fair use across all Notion AI users, your access to AI features can be temporarily reduced depending on your usage. How can I learn more about Notion AI? Check out Notion Academy or our Help Center for more ideas on how to get started incorporating Notion AI into your everyday work. English (US) Cookie settings © 2026 Notion Labs, Inc.
